summary: CJ Mitchell is a 42-year-old Principal Product Manager at Amazon specializing in AI Forecasting and Logistics, based in Atlanta. He runs a YouTube channel called Putchuon with 65,000 subscribers focused on AI education and is building the Context Journey, an AI system to preserve his thinking patterns and values for his son. He is married to Lola Mafe with an unconventional living arrangement, has an 8-year-old son named London, and previously ran a successful beat-selling business called Flawless Tracks.

relationships.name: Lola Mafe
relationships.context: Married since February 2023, living in separate homes two blocks apart

active_projects.name: Putchuon YouTube Channel
active_projects.description: AI education channel with about 65,000 subscribers

active_projects.name: Context Journey
active_projects.description: A system to preserve his thinking patterns and values for his son using AI

key_facts: Previously ran Flawless Tracks, a beat-selling business that made about 150K per year at its peak
Lives two blocks away from spouse in separate homes
